Battle Cards
View On FortressMaximus.io

Backup Plan

  1. What battle cards are in the Metroplex Pack?
    3 x Armored Plating
    3 x Backup Plan
    2 x Combat Training
    2 x Data Pad
    3 x Flamethrower
    3 x Force Field
    3 x Handheld Blaster
    3 x Height Advantage
    3 x Improvised Shield
    3 x Inspiring Leadership
    3 x Protected By Metroplex
    3 x Rally the City
    3 x Rapid Conversion
    3 x Supercharge
  2. Can I play Backup Plan if it’s the last card in my hand?
    Yes. Your hand will then be empty. You won’t scrap any cards, but you will draw 3 cards.
